title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 812.8 - Compensation for consulting services
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 812.8 - Compensation for consulting services

State Regulations

The consultant selected by the county shall propose a fee for
his services in preparing the charter law. The basis for the fee shall be
stated. The proposed fee for consulting services shall be based on: (a) Lump sum, taking into account reasonable
consulting costs for similar work, or
(b) An audited consulting payroll cost
required to perform the work, plus a reasonable amount to cover overhead and
profit, and as agreed to between the consultant, the commissioner and the
county. (c) A combination of (a)
and (b). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
812.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
